gpt-message.content: You are an expert in hardware design with a deep understanding of Verilog RTL codes. And I want you to help me process the raw data, transforming it into suitable formats that can serve as inputs and outputs for the model.

It only includes a Verilog `timescale directive which specifies the time unit and time precision for the simulator which in this case are both set to 1 nanosecond. Therefore, it does not provide any information regarding module functionality or operations.

Input and output ports and their explanation is as follows:

Internal signals and their explanation is as follows:

Consequently, there is no pertinent information or context available for discussing internal signals or their roles in this scenario.
